issues.title: [LOW] Host Can Set Memory Controller AES Key
issues.description: On Leo controllers configured to use the provided AES key for encryption, the host may use weak entropy toconfigure the memory controller, or not enable the memory encryption.

issues.title: [LOW] Insufficient Protection Against Fault Injection Attacks
issues.description: An attacker can carry out a successful fault injection attack even though critical tests have been duplicated.

issues.title: [INFO] Additional informational recommendations - Data in EEPROM Cannot Be Trusted
issues.description: EEPROM was used to store the GPIO configurations, but those were moved in `syscfg` that is cryptographically validated.As such, this issue is reported due to an abundance of caution to avoid storing in the EEPROM any sensitive data in the future.
